job.title: Senior Data Engineer
job.description: ltpgtltstronggtCompany IntroductionltstronggtltpgtltpgtBlockTrace LLC was founded in 2018 with the primary objective of working with customers to solve challenges related to investigating incidents of money laundering asset recovery fraud and other financial crimes involving the use of cryptocurrencies It has helped private companies and government agencies to address these challenges Its team has a diversified range of skills and experience including but not limited to conducting cyber and cryptocurrency investigations software engineering big data analytics and forensicsltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtThe ChallengeltstronggtltpgtltpgtWe are looking for a senior data engineer who will be a powerful addition to our team You are naturally curious a software engineer by heart and are adept at working with big data using scripts that you create This includes identifying patterns behaviors and identifying specific items and insights that are of value You enjoy creating nodes and relationships using graph database technologies You are passionate about developing scripts algorithms building predictive analytics using automation applying machine learning and using the right combination of tools and frameworks to turn sets of disparate data points into objective answers You are a quick learner energetic curious passionate and motivated to meet project objectives Most importantly you are a great communicator excellent team player and be able to operate in a collaborative environmentltpgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtYou Haveltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligt5 years of professional experience in an engineering roleltligtltligt5 years of professional experience in PythonltligtltligtDatabase query experience in SQL NoSQL and CypherltligtltligtGraph database experience using Neo4j Amazon Neptune andor Tiger Graph etcltligtltligtExperience with the ETL process Extract Transform and LoadltligtltligtExperience leveraging the use of advanced machine learning algorithms eg Neo4j Graph Data Science LibraryltligtltligtExperience with various clients Neo4j Browser Bloom Mongo Compass etcltligtltligtLinux experience in RHEL CentOS Debian andor UbuntultligtltligtExperience in developing scripts in both Python and BashltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtNice If You HaveltstronggtltpgtltulgtltligtExperience using virtualization software such as VMWare ESXI Google Cloud Platform AWS Azure etcltligtltligtExperience in using visualization tools Plotly Matplotlib Seaborn ggplot Metabase Power BI Amazon Quicksight andor Apache SupersetltligtltligtExperience using web services such as Google BigQuery Redshift S3 Spark andor AWSltligtltligtExperience with distributed datacomputing tools MapReduce Hadoop Hive Spark Gurobi and MySQLltligtltligtExperience working with blockchain data via different APIsltligtltligtKnowledge of a variety of machine learning techniques clustering decision tree learning artificial neural networks etc and their realworld advantagesdrawbacksltligtltligtExperience with accessing the Dark web Darknet Marketplaces and conducting cryptocurrency transactionsltligtltulgtltpgtltbrgtltpgtltpgtltemgtWe are an EOE that empowers our peopleno matter their race color religion sex gender identity sexual orientation national origin disability veteran status or other protected characteristicto fearlessly drive changeltemgtltpgtltpgtltemgtltspan classqlcursorgtltspangtltemgtltpgtltpgtltstronggtCitizenshipampnbspltstronggtUS Citizenship is required
